item.title: Crossplane News 000
item.description: Welcome to the first ever issue of Crossplane News! On to this issuesÂ´s news and other interesting things in the broader Kubernetes and Cloud Native ecosystem. Provider Spotlight New service announcements and features New and notable blogs Crossplane vs Terraform by Nic Cope, Principal Engineer at Upbound New videos and webinars Ecosystem news asddas Crossplane at conferences Kubecon 2020 in Valencia, Spain Learning From Providing A Platform API With Kubernetes And Crossplane by Hannes Blut & Jan Willies at Accenture test
